title: The vvorkes of a young wyt, trust vp with a fardell of pretie fancies profitable to young poetes, preiudicial to no man, and pleasaunt to euery man, to passe away idle tyme withall. Whereunto is ioyned an odde kynde of wooing, with a banquet of comfettes, to make an ende withall. Done by N.B. Gentleman.
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: Nigh vnto the three Cranes in the Vintree, by Thomas Dawson, and Thomas Gardyner,
notes: Printers' names and address from colophon; preface dated 14 May 1577.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
T.p. in facsimile from W.A. White (L?) copy.
